ModMetaData.name: Seed Vault
ModMetaData.author: Espio Idsavant
ModMetaData.description: This introduces Seed Vault storage items that can only contain seeds, but can store a massive amount of them. Can be used with either the original Seeds Please Lite, or the newer Seeds Please Lite Redux. LWM's Deep Storage is required. Art provided by .Phaneron! Additional graphics unlocked with Vanilla Furniture Expanded.
